### CORE: Yapay Zeka Uygulamalarƒ± i√ßin Ki≈üisel Hafƒ±za Katmanƒ±nƒ±z

RowTranslations.originContent: ### CORE: Your Personal Memory Layer for AI Apps
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ### CORE: Yapay Zeka Uygulamalarƒ± i√ßin Ki≈üisel Hafƒ±za Katmanƒ±nƒ±z

Content:
Documentation ‚Ä¢ Discord

## üî• Research Highlights CORE memory achieves **88.24%** average accuracy in Locomo dataset across all reasoning tasks, significantly outperforming other memory providers. Check out this [blog](https://blog.heysol.ai/core-build-memory-knowledge-graph-for-individuals-and-achieved-sota-on-locomo-benchmark/) for more info. (1) Single-hop questions require answers based on a single session; (2) Multi-hop questions require synthesizing information from multiple different sessions; (3) Open-domain knowledge questions can be answered by integrating a speaker‚Äôs provided information with external knowledge such as commonsense or world facts; (4) Temporal reasoning questions can be answered through temporal reasoning and capturing time-related data cues within the conversation; ## Overview **Problem** Developers waste time re-explaining context to AI tools. Hit token limits in Claude? Start fresh and lose everything. Switch from ChatGPT/Claude to Cursor? Explain your context again. Your conversations, decisions, and insights vanish between sessions. With every new AI tool, the cost of context switching grows. **Solution** - **CORE** (**Contextual Observation & Recall Engine**) CORE is an open-source unified, persistent memory layer for all your AI tools. Your context follows you from Cursor to Claude to ChatGPT to Claude Code. One knowledge graph remembers who said what, when, and why. Connect once, remember everywhere. Stop managing context and start building. ## üöÄ CORE Self-Hosting Want to run CORE on your own infrastructure? Self-hosting gives you complete control over your data and deployment. **Prerequisites**: - Docker (20.10.0+) and Docker Compose (2.20.0+) installed - OpenAI API key > **Note on Open-Source Models:** We tested OSS options like Ollama and GPT models, but their fact extraction and graph quality fell short. We're actively looking for options. ### Setup 1. Clone the repository:
Translation:
Dok√ºmantasyon ‚Ä¢ Discord

## üî• Ara≈ütƒ±rma √ñne √áƒ±kanlar CORE hafƒ±zasƒ±, Locomo veri setindeki t√ºm akƒ±l y√ºr√ºtme g√∂revlerinde **%88,24** ortalama doƒüruluk oranƒ±na ula≈üarak diƒüer hafƒ±za saƒülayƒ±cƒ±larƒ±nƒ± √∂nemli √∂l√ß√ºde geride bƒ±rakƒ±yor. Daha fazla bilgi i√ßin bu [blogu](https://blog.heysol.ai/core-build-memory-knowledge-graph-for-individuals-and-achieved-sota-on-locomo-benchmark/) inceleyin. (1) Tek adƒ±mlƒ± sorular, yalnƒ±zca bir oturumdan yanƒ±t gerektirir; (2) √áok adƒ±mlƒ± sorular, birden fazla farklƒ± oturumdan bilgi sentezi gerektirir; (3) A√ßƒ±k alan bilgi sorularƒ±, konu≈ümacƒ±nƒ±n saƒüladƒ±ƒüƒ± bilgiler ile dƒ±≈ü bilgiler (genel bilgi veya d√ºnya ger√ßekleri gibi) birle≈ütirilerek yanƒ±tlanabilir; (4) Zamansal akƒ±l y√ºr√ºtme sorularƒ±, konu≈üma i√ßindeki zamana ili≈ükin veri ipu√ßlarƒ±nƒ±n yakalanmasƒ± ve zamansal akƒ±l y√ºr√ºtme ile yanƒ±tlanabilir; ## Genel Bakƒ±≈ü **Sorun** Geli≈ütiriciler, baƒülamƒ± AI ara√ßlarƒ±na tekrar tekrar a√ßƒ±klayarak zaman kaybediyor. Claude'da token sƒ±nƒ±rƒ±na mƒ± takƒ±ldƒ±nƒ±z? Yeniden ba≈ülatƒ±n ve her ≈üeyi kaybedin. ChatGPT/Claude'dan Cursor'a ge√ßtiniz mi? Baƒülamƒ±nƒ±zƒ± tekrar a√ßƒ±klayƒ±n. Konu≈ümalarƒ±nƒ±z, kararlarƒ±nƒ±z ve i√ßg√∂r√ºleriniz oturumlar arasƒ±nda kayboluyor. Her yeni AI aracƒ±yla baƒülam deƒüi≈ütirme maliyeti artƒ±yor. **√á√∂z√ºm** - **CORE** (**Baƒülamsal G√∂zlem & Hatƒ±rlama Motoru**) CORE, t√ºm AI ara√ßlarƒ±nƒ±z i√ßin a√ßƒ±k kaynaklƒ±, birle≈üik ve kalƒ±cƒ± bir hafƒ±za katmanƒ±dƒ±r. Baƒülamƒ±nƒ±z Cursor‚Äôdan Claude‚Äôa, ChatGPT‚Äôden Claude Code‚Äôa sizinle gelir. Tek bir bilgi grafiƒüi, kim ne zaman ne dedi ve neden dediƒüini hatƒ±rlar. Bir kere baƒülanƒ±n, her yerde hatƒ±rlayƒ±n. Baƒülam y√∂netmeyi bƒ±rakƒ±n ve √ºretmeye ba≈ülayƒ±n. ## üöÄ CORE Kendin Barƒ±ndƒ±rma CORE'u kendi altyapƒ±nƒ±zda √ßalƒ±≈ütƒ±rmak ister misiniz? Kendin barƒ±ndƒ±rma, verileriniz ve daƒüƒ±tƒ±mƒ±nƒ±z √ºzerinde tam kontrol saƒülar. **√ñnko≈üullar**: - Docker (20.10.0+) ve Docker Compose (2.20.0+) kurulu olmalƒ± - OpenAI API anahtarƒ± > **A√ßƒ±k Kaynak Modeller Hakkƒ±nda Not:** Ollama ve GPT gibi a√ßƒ±k kaynak se√ßeneklerini test ettik, ancak bilgi √ßƒ±karƒ±mƒ± ve grafik kalitesi yetersiz kaldƒ±. Aktif olarak se√ßenekler arƒ±yoruz. ### Kurulum 1. Depoyu klonlayƒ±n:

Content:
Once deployed, you can configure your AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic) and start building your memory graph.

üëâ [View complete self-hosting guide](https://docs.heysol.ai/self-hosting/docker)

Note: We tried open-source models like Ollama or GPT OSS but facts generation were not good, we are still figuring out how to improve on that and then will also support OSS models.

## üöÄ CORE Cloud
**Build your unified memory graph in 5 minutes:**

Don't want to manage infrastructure? CORE Cloud lets you build your personal memory system instantly - no setup, no servers, just memory that works.

1. **Sign Up** at [core.heysol.ai](https://core.heysol.ai) and create your account
2. **Visualize your memory graph** and see how CORE automatically forms connections between facts
3. **Test it out** - ask "What do you know about me?" in conversation section
4. Connect to your tools:
   - [Claude](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude) & [Cursor](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/cursor) - coding with context
   - [CLaude Code CLI](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude-code) & [Codex CLI](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/codex) - terminal-based coding with memory
   - [Add Browser Extension](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/browser-extension) - bring your memory to any website
   - [Linear](https://docs.heysol.ai/integrations/linear), [Github](https://docs.heysol.ai/integrations/github) - add project context automatically

## üß© Key Features

### üß† **Unified, Portable Memory**: 
Add and recall your memory across **Cursor, Windsurf, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, AWS's Kiro, VS Code, and Roo Code** via MCP

![core-claude](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/56c98288-ee87-4cd0-8b02-860aca1c7f9a)


### üï∏Ô∏è **Temporal + Reified Knowledge Graph**: 

Remember the story behind every fact‚Äîtrack who said what, when, and why with rich relationships and full provenance, not just flat storage

![core-memory-graph](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5d1ee659-d519-4624-85d1-e0497cbdd60a)


### üåê **Browser Extension**: 

Save conversations and content from ChatGPT, Grok, Gemini, Twitter, YouTube, blog posts, and any webpage directly into your CORE memory.
Translation:
Daƒüƒ±tƒ±mdan sonra, AI saƒülayƒ±cƒ±larƒ±nƒ±zƒ± (OpenAI, Anthropic) yapƒ±landƒ±rabilir ve hafƒ±za grafiƒüinizi olu≈üturmaya ba≈ülayabilirsiniz.

üëâ [Tam kapsamlƒ± self-hosting rehberini g√∂r√ºnt√ºle](https://docs.heysol.ai/self-hosting/docker)

Not: Ollama veya GPT OSS gibi a√ßƒ±k kaynaklƒ± modelleri denedik fakat ger√ßekler √ºretiminde iyi deƒüillerdi, bunu nasƒ±l geli≈ütireceƒüimizi h√¢l√¢ ara≈ütƒ±rƒ±yoruz ve ardƒ±ndan OSS modellerini de destekleyeceƒüiz.

## üöÄ CORE Cloud
**Birle≈üik hafƒ±za grafiƒüinizi 5 dakikada olu≈üturun:**

Altyapƒ±yƒ± y√∂netmek istemiyor musunuz? CORE Cloud ile ki≈üisel hafƒ±za sisteminizi anƒ±nda kurabilirsiniz - kurulum yok, sunucu yok, sadece √ßalƒ±≈üan hafƒ±za.

1. [core.heysol.ai](https://core.heysol.ai) adresinden **Kayƒ±t Olun** ve hesabƒ±nƒ±zƒ± olu≈üturun
2. **Hafƒ±za grafiƒüinizi g√∂rselle≈ütirin** ve CORE'un ger√ßekler arasƒ±nda otomatik olarak baƒülantƒ±lar kurduƒüunu izleyin
3. **Deneyin** - sohbet b√∂l√ºm√ºnde "Benim hakkƒ±mda ne biliyorsun?" diye sorun
4. Ara√ßlarƒ±nƒ±za baƒülanƒ±n:
   - [Claude](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude) & [Cursor](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/cursor) - baƒülam ile kodlama
   - [Claude Code CLI](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude-code) & [Codex CLI](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/codex) - hafƒ±zalƒ± terminal tabanlƒ± kodlama
   - [Tarayƒ±cƒ± Eklentisi Ekle](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/browser-extension) - hafƒ±zanƒ±zƒ± herhangi bir siteye ta≈üƒ±yƒ±n
   - [Linear](https://docs.heysol.ai/integrations/linear), [Github](https://docs.heysol.ai/integrations/github) - proje baƒülamƒ±nƒ± otomatik olarak ekleyin

## üß© Ana √ñzellikler

### üß† **Birle≈üik, Ta≈üƒ±nabilir Hafƒ±za**: 
Hafƒ±zanƒ±zƒ± **Cursor, Windsurf, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, AWS'nin Kiro'su, VS Code ve Roo Code** √ºzerinden MCP ile ekleyin ve hatƒ±rlayƒ±n

![core-claude](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/56c98288-ee87-4cd0-8b02-860aca1c7f9a)


### üï∏Ô∏è **Zamansal + Yeniden Nesnele≈ütirilmi≈ü Bilgi Grafiƒüi**: 

Her ger√ßeƒüin ardƒ±ndaki hikayeyi hatƒ±rlayƒ±n‚Äîkim ne dedi, ne zaman ve neden; zengin ili≈ükiler ve tam k√∂ken ile, sadece d√ºz depolama deƒüil

![core-memory-graph](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5d1ee659-d519-4624-85d1-e0497cbdd60a)


### üåê **Tarayƒ±cƒ± Eklentisi**: 

ChatGPT, Grok, Gemini, Twitter, YouTube, blog yazƒ±larƒ± ve herhangi bir web sitesinden sohbetleri ve i√ßerikleri doƒürudan CORE hafƒ±zanƒ±za kaydedin.

Content: **How to Use Extension** 1. [Download the Extension](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/core-extension/cglndoindnhdbfcbijikibfjoholdjcc) from the Chrome Web Store. 2. Login to [CORE dashboard](https://core.heysol.ai) - Navigate to Settings (bottom left) - Go to API Key ‚Üí Generate new key ‚Üí Name it ‚Äúextension.‚Äù 3. Open the extension, paste your API key, and save. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6e629834-1b9d-4fe6-ae58-a9068986036a ### üí¨ **Chat with Memory**: Ask questions like "What are my writing preferences?" with instant insights from your connected knowledge ![chat-with-memory](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d798802f-bd51-4daf-b2b5-46de7d206f66) ### ‚ö° **Auto-Sync from Apps**: Automatically capture relevant context from Linear, Slack, Notion, GitHub and other connected apps into your CORE memory üìñ **[View All Integrations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RedPlanetHQ/core/main/./integrations/README.md)** - Complete list of supported services and their features ![core-slack](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d5fefe38-221e-4076-8a44-8ed673960f03) ### üîó **MCP Integration Hub**: Connect Linear, Slack, GitHub, Notion once to CORE‚Äîthen use all their tools in Claude, Cursor, or any MCP client with a single URL ![core-linear-claude](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7d59d92b-8c56-4745-a7ab-9a3c0341aa32) ## How CORE create memory CORE‚Äôs ingestion pipeline has four phases designed to capture evolving context:

[CORE kontrol paneline](https://core.heysol.ai) giri≈ü yapƒ±n - Ayarlar‚Äôa gidin (sol alt k√∂≈üe) - API Anahtarƒ± ‚Üí Yeni anahtar olu≈ütur ‚Üí Adƒ±nƒ± ‚Äúeklenti‚Äù olarak belirleyin. 3. Eklentiyi a√ßƒ±n, API anahtarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± yapƒ±≈ütƒ±rƒ±n ve kaydedin. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6e629834-1b9d-4fe6-ae58-a9068986036a ### üí¨ **Hafƒ±zayla Sohbet**: Baƒülƒ± bilginizden anƒ±nda i√ßg√∂r√ºler alarak "Yazma tercihleri neler?" gibi sorular sorun ![chat-with-memory](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d798802f-bd51-4daf-b2b5-46de7d206f66) ### ‚ö° **Uygulamalardan Otomatik Senkronizasyon**: Linear, Slack, Notion, GitHub ve diƒüer baƒülƒ± uygulamalardan ilgili baƒülamƒ± otomatik olarak CORE hafƒ±zasƒ±na aktarƒ±n üìñ **[T√ºm Entegrasyonlarƒ± G√∂r√ºnt√ºle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RedPlanetHQ/core/main/./integrations/README.md)** - Desteklenen hizmetlerin ve √∂zelliklerinin tam listesi ![core-slack](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d5fefe38-221e-4076-8a44-8ed673960f03) ### üîó **MCP Entegrasyon Merkezi**: Linear, Slack, GitHub, Notion‚Äôu bir kez CORE‚Äôa baƒülayƒ±n‚Äîsonra Claude, Cursor veya herhangi bir MCP istemcisinde t√ºm ara√ßlarƒ± tek bir URL ile kullanƒ±n ![core-linear-claude](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7d59d92b-8c56-4745-a7ab-9a3c0341aa32) ## CORE hafƒ±zayƒ± nasƒ±l olu≈üturur CORE‚Äôun veri toplama hattƒ±, geli≈üen baƒülamƒ± yakalamak i√ßin tasarlanmƒ±≈ü d√∂rt a≈üamadan olu≈üur:

RowTranslations.originContent: Ask questions like "What are my writing preferences?" with instant insights from your connected knowledge

RowTranslations.originContent: Automatically capture relevant context from Linear, Slack, Notion, GitHub and other connected apps into your CORE memory
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Linear, Slack, Notion, GitHub ve diƒüer baƒülƒ± uygulamalardan ilgili baƒülamƒ± otomatik olarak CORE hafƒ±zasƒ±na aktarƒ±n

RowTranslations.originContent: üìñ **[View All Integrations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RedPlanetHQ/core/main/./integrations/README.md)** - Complete list of supported services and their features
RowTranslations.translatedContent: üìñ **[T√ºm Entegrasyonlarƒ± G√∂r√ºnt√ºle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RedPlanetHQ/core/main/./integrations/README.md)** - Desteklenen hizmetlerin ve √∂zelliklerinin tam listesi

RowTranslations.originContent: Connect Linear, Slack, GitHub, Notion once to CORE‚Äîthen use all their tools in Claude, Cursor, or any MCP client with a single URL
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Linear, Slack, GitHub, Notion‚Äôu bir kez CORE‚Äôa baƒülayƒ±n‚Äîsonra Claude, Cursor veya herhangi bir MCP istemcisinde t√ºm ara√ßlarƒ± tek bir URL ile kullanƒ±n

RowTranslations.originContent: CORE‚Äôs ingestion pipeline has four phases designed to capture evolving context:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: CORE‚Äôun veri toplama hattƒ±, geli≈üen baƒülamƒ± yakalamak i√ßin tasarlanmƒ±≈ü d√∂rt a≈üamadan olu≈üur:

Content: 1. **Normalization**: Links new information to recent context, breaks long documents into coherent chunks while keeping cross-references, and standardizes terms so by the time CORE extracts knowledge, it‚Äôs working with clean, contextualized input instead of messy text. 2. **Extraction**: Pulls meaning from normalized text by identifying entities (people, tools, projects, concepts), turning them into statements with context, source, and time, and mapping relationships. For example, ‚ÄúWe wrote CORE in Next.js‚Äù becomes: Entities (Core, Next.js), Statement (CORE was developed using Next.js), and Relationship (was developed using). 3. **Resolution**: Detects contradictions, tracks how preferences evolve, and preserves multiple perspectives with provenance instead of overwriting them so memory reflects your full journey, not just the latest snapshot. 4. **Graph Integration**: Connects entities, statements, and episodes into a temporal knowledge graph that links facts to their context and history, turning isolated data into a living web of knowledge agents can actually use. The Result: Instead of a flat database, CORE gives you a memory that grows and changes with you - preserving context, evolution, and ownership so agents can actually use it. ![memory-ingest-eg](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1d0a8007-153a-4842-9586-f6f4de43e647) ## How CORE recalls from memory When you ask CORE a question, it doesn‚Äôt just look up text - it digs into your whole knowledge graph to find the most useful answers. 1. **Search**: CORE looks through memory from multiple angles at once - keyword search for exact matches, semantic search for related ideas even if phrased differently, and graph traversal to follow links between connected concepts. 2. **Re-Rank**: The retrieved results are reordered to highlight the most relevant and diverse ones, ensuring you don‚Äôt just see obvious matches but also deeper connections. 3. **Filtering**: CORE applies smart filters based on time, reliability, and relationship strength, so only the most meaningful knowledge surfaces. 4. **Output**: You get back both facts (clear statements) and episodes (the original context they came from), so recall is always grounded in context, time, and story. The result: CORE doesn‚Äôt just recall facts - it recalls them in the right context, time, and story, so agents can respond the way you would remember. ## Documentation Explore our documentation to get the most out of CORE - [Basic Concepts](https://docs.heysol.ai/concepts/memory_graph) - [Self Hosting](https://docs.heysol.ai/self-hosting/overview) - [Connect Core MCP with Claude](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude) - [Connect Core MCP with Cursor](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/cursor) - [Connect Core MCP with Claude Code](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude-code) - [Connect Core MCP with Codex](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/codex) - [Basic Concepts](https://docs.heysol.ai/overview) - [API Reference](https://docs.heysol.ai/api-reference/get-user-profile) ## üîí Security CORE takes security seriously. We implement industry-standard security practices to protect your data:
Translation: 1. **Normalizasyon**: Yeni bilgileri yakƒ±n zamandaki baƒülama baƒülar, uzun belgeleri tutarlƒ± par√ßalara ayƒ±rƒ±rken √ßapraz referanslarƒ± korur ve terimleri standartla≈ütƒ±rƒ±r; b√∂ylece CORE bilgi √ßƒ±karƒ±mƒ± yaptƒ±ƒüƒ±nda, daƒüƒ±nƒ±k metin yerine temiz ve baƒülamsalla≈ütƒ±rƒ±lmƒ±≈ü girdiyle √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±r. 2. **√áƒ±karƒ±m**: Normalle≈ütirilmi≈ü metinden anlam √ßƒ±karƒ±r; varlƒ±klarƒ± (ki≈üi, ara√ß, proje, kavram) tanƒ±mlar, bunlarƒ± baƒülam, kaynak ve zamanla ifadeye d√∂n√º≈üt√ºr√ºr ve ili≈ükileri haritalar. √ñrneƒüin, ‚ÄúCORE‚Äôu Next.js ile yazdƒ±k‚Äù ≈üu ≈üekilde olur: Varlƒ±klar (CORE, Next.js), ƒ∞fade (CORE Next.js kullanƒ±larak geli≈ütirildi), ƒ∞li≈üki (geli≈ütirildi). 3. **√á√∂z√ºmleme**: √áeli≈ükileri tespit eder, tercihlerin nasƒ±l deƒüi≈ütiƒüini izler ve k√∂keniyle birlikte birden √ßok bakƒ±≈ü a√ßƒ±sƒ±nƒ± korur; b√∂ylece hafƒ±za sadece en son anƒ± deƒüil, t√ºm yolculuƒüunuzu yansƒ±tƒ±r. 4. **Grafik Entegrasyonu**: Varlƒ±klarƒ±, ifadeleri ve olaylarƒ± zamansal bir bilgi grafiƒüinde birle≈ütirir; ger√ßekleri baƒülam ve ge√ßmi≈üine baƒülar, b√∂ylece izole veriyi ajanlarƒ±n ger√ßekten kullanabileceƒüi canlƒ± bir bilgi aƒüƒ±na d√∂n√º≈üt√ºr√ºr. Sonu√ß: D√ºz bir veritabanƒ± yerine, CORE size baƒülamƒ±, evrimi ve sahipliƒüi koruyan; ajanlarƒ±n ger√ßekten kullanabileceƒüi, sizinle birlikte b√ºy√ºyen ve deƒüi≈üen bir hafƒ±za sunar. ![memory-ingest-eg](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1d0a8007-153a-4842-9586-f6f4de43e647) ## CORE hafƒ±zadan nasƒ±l geri √ßaƒüƒ±rƒ±yor? CORE‚Äôa bir soru sorduƒüunuzda, sadece metin aramaz; t√ºm bilgi grafiƒüinizi tarayarak en faydalƒ± yanƒ±tlarƒ± bulur. 1. **Arama**: CORE aynƒ± anda hafƒ±zada birden √ßok a√ßƒ±dan arama yapar; anahtar kelime aramasƒ± ile tam e≈üle≈ümeler, anlamsal arama ile farklƒ± ifade edilmi≈ü ilgili fikirler ve grafik ge√ßi≈üi ile baƒülƒ± kavramlar arasƒ±ndaki baƒülantƒ±lar takip edilir. 2. **Yeniden Sƒ±ralama**: Getirilen sonu√ßlar, en alakalƒ± ve √ße≈üitli olanlarƒ± √∂ne √ßƒ±karacak ≈üekilde yeniden sƒ±ralanƒ±r; b√∂ylece sadece bariz e≈üle≈ümeleri deƒüil, daha derin baƒülantƒ±larƒ± da g√∂r√ºrs√ºn√ºz. 3. **Filtreleme**: CORE, zaman, g√ºvenilirlik ve ili≈üki g√ºc√ºne g√∂re akƒ±llƒ± filtreler uygular; b√∂ylece yalnƒ±zca en anlamlƒ± bilgiler ortaya √ßƒ±kar. 4. **√áƒ±ktƒ±**: Hem ger√ßekleri (a√ßƒ±k ifadeler) hem de olaylarƒ± (geldikleri orijinal baƒülam) geri alƒ±rsƒ±nƒ±z; b√∂ylece geri √ßaƒüƒ±rma her zaman baƒülam, zaman ve hikayeye dayanƒ±r. Sonu√ß: CORE yalnƒ±zca ger√ßekleri deƒüil, onlarƒ± doƒüru baƒülamda, zamanda ve hikayede hatƒ±rlayarak; ajanlarƒ±n sizin hatƒ±rlayacaƒüƒ±nƒ±z ≈üekilde yanƒ±t verebilmesini saƒülar. ## Dok√ºmantasyon CORE‚Äôdan en iyi ≈üekilde yararlanmak i√ßin dok√ºmantasyonumuzu ke≈üfedin - [Temel Kavramlar](https://docs.heysol.ai/concepts/memory_graph) - [Kendi Sunucunuzu Kurun](https://docs.heysol.ai/self-hosting/overview) - [Core MCP‚Äôyi Claude ile Baƒülayƒ±n](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude) - [Core MCP‚Äôyi Cursor ile Baƒülayƒ±n](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/cursor) - [Core MCP‚Äôyi Claude Code ile Baƒülayƒ±n](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/claude-code) - [Core MCP‚Äôyi Codex ile Baƒülayƒ±n](https://docs.heysol.ai/providers/codex) - [Temel Kavramlar](https://docs.heysol.ai/overview) - [API Referansƒ±](https://docs.heysol.ai/api-reference/get-user-profile) ## üîí G√ºvenlik CORE g√ºvenliƒüi ciddiye alƒ±r. Verilerinizi korumak i√ßin sekt√∂r standartlarƒ±nda g√ºvenlik uygulamalarƒ± uygularƒ±z:

RowTranslations.originContent: CORE takes security seriously. We implement industry-standard security practices to protect your data:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: CORE g√ºvenliƒüi ciddiye alƒ±r. Verilerinizi korumak i√ßin sekt√∂r standartlarƒ±nda g√ºvenlik uygulamalarƒ± uygularƒ±z:

Content: - **Data Encryption**: All data in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256) - **Authentication**: OAuth 2.0 and magic link authentication - **Access Control**: Workspace-based isolation and role-based permissions - **Vulnerability Reporting**: Please report security issues to harshith@poozle.dev For detailed security information, see our [Security Policy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RedPlanetHQ/core/main/SECURITY.md). ## üßë‚Äçüíª Support Have questions or feedback? We're here to help: - Discord: [Join core-support channel](https://discord.gg/YGUZcvDjUa) - Documentation: [docs.heysol.ai](https://docs.heysol.ai) - Email: manik@poozle.dev ## Usage Guidelines **Store:** - Conversation history - User preferences - Task context - Reference materials **Don't Store:** - Sensitive data (PII) - Credentials - System logs - Temporary data ## üë• Contributors
Translation: - **Veri ≈ûifreleme**: Aktarƒ±lan t√ºm veriler (TLS 1.3) ve depolanan veriler (AES-256) - **Kimlik Doƒürulama**: OAuth 2.0 ve sihirli baƒülantƒ± ile kimlik doƒürulama - **Eri≈üim Kontrol√º**: √áalƒ±≈üma alanƒ± tabanlƒ± izolasyon ve rol tabanlƒ± izinler - **G√ºvenlik A√ßƒ±ƒüƒ± Bildirimi**: L√ºtfen g√ºvenlik sorunlarƒ±nƒ± harshith@poozle.dev adresine bildirin Detaylƒ± g√ºvenlik bilgileri i√ßin [G√ºvenlik Politikamƒ±za](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RedPlanetHQ/core/main/SECURITY.md) g√∂z atƒ±n. ## üßë‚Äçüíª Destek Sorularƒ±nƒ±z veya geri bildiriminiz mi var? Yardƒ±m etmek i√ßin buradayƒ±z: - Discord: [core-support kanalƒ±na katƒ±lƒ±n](https://discord.gg/YGUZcvDjUa) - Dok√ºmantasyon: [docs.heysol.ai](https://docs.heysol.ai) - E-posta: manik@poozle.dev ## Kullanƒ±m Y√∂nergeleri **Depolayƒ±n:** - Konu≈üma ge√ßmi≈üi - Kullanƒ±cƒ± tercihleri - G√∂rev baƒülamƒ± - Referans materyaller **Depolamayƒ±n:** - Hassas veriler (Ki≈üisel Tanƒ±mlanabilir Bilgi) - Kimlik bilgileri - Sistem g√ºnl√ºkleri - Ge√ßici veriler ## üë• Katkƒ±da Bulunanlar

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Veri ≈ûifreleme**: Aktarƒ±lan t√ºm veriler (TLS 1.3) ve depolanan veriler (AES-256)
- **Kimlik Doƒürulama**: OAuth 2.0 ve sihirli baƒülantƒ± ile kimlik doƒürulama
